sentences.en: A new hacksaw blade, double surface alloying hand hacksaw blade, is introduced in the paper.
sentences.cn: 本文将介绍一种新型手用锯条 —— 双层辉光离子渗金属手用锯条.

sentences.en: A tube cutter works best but you can use a hacksaw.
sentences.cn: 最好用截管器，不过用钢锯也能凑合。

sentences.en: After substantial wear and tear on a hacksaw, our man finally through the strong steel cable.
sentences.cn: 在把钢锯结结实实地磨损了一番之后, 我们的主角终于把粗大的钢缆切断了.

sentences.en: I join in with the back quarter, separating the rear leg from the prized rib joints with a hacksaw.
sentences.cn: 我加入了处理后段的工作中，用钢锯从肋骨关节将后腿分离出来。

sentences.en: The cause of brittle fracture on hacksaw blades - blank were analyzed.
sentences.cn: 检验分析了机用锯条坯脆断的原因.

sentences.en: The utility model discloses a grab handle rotatable hacksaw.
sentences.cn: 本实用新型公开了一种握柄可转式钢锯.

trans.tran_cn: 可锯金属的弓形锯，钢锯
trans.tran_en: a cutting tool with small teeth on its blade, used especially for cutting metal
